bibl.title: "Welcome to Heaven, Please Watch Your Step": The "Mithras Liturgy" and the Homeric Quotations in the Paris Papyrus.
bibl.note: I. Introduction. - II. The Mithras Liturgy [P.G.M. IV, 475-820]: Features of the Text and Genre. - III. Kicking Ass and Taking (Sacred) Names: The Role of Diomedes in the Iliad. - IV. Rehabilitation and Revelation: Homer's Ancient Commentators. - V. The Homeric Quotations in the Paris Papyrus: Diomedes Meets Mithras.
bibl.seg: STOHOLSKI Mark, "Welcome to Heaven, Please Watch Your Step": The "Mithras Liturgy" and the Homeric Quotations in the Paris Papyrus.

I. Introduction. - II. The Mithras Liturgy [P.G.M. IV, 475-820]: Features of the Text and Genre. - III. Kicking Ass and Taking (Sacred) Names: The Role of Diomedes in the Iliad. - IV. Rehabilitation and Revelation: Homer's Ancient Commentators. - V. The Homeric Quotations in the Paris Papyrus: Diomedes Meets Mithras.
